ygData.subject: Re: Where is a good place for a lvl 17 to hunt?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello there, I think the best place to gain experience at your level would be East Karana.  The loot is extremely bad, but the xp is really goood for soloing.
ygData.messageBody:
Hello there,

I think the best place to gain experience at your level would be East
Karana. The loot is extremely bad, but the xp is really goood for
soloing. However to hunt here you must be willing to kite the blues in
this area. Just kite the creatures around for a bit and then fight them
at the briodge to North Karana. If anything goes wrong you can zone quite
easily.

Treilanin - 19th Rank Bard
Honour Guard - Karana


On Tue, 15 Jun 1999, CMai wrote:

> Hello Everyone,
>
> I am a lvl 17 bard trying to find a good place to hunt. I am mostly around
> Oasis but willing to travel for exp and loot. I need a good place with
> decent amount of plp to group with. I tried Unrest, and Highpass. It seems
> that no one wants a bard because we attract too much attentions. Please
> give suggestions.
>
> Thnx,
> Your Friendly Rogue and Bard
> Hammerpaw and Samiam
> Champions of Norrath, The Rathe
>
>
>
>
